headline: Spectrum drops bold new offer after heavy customer losses
summary: Spectrum, operated by Charter Communications, is struggling to compete against broadband rivals. In recent months, the company saw a surge in internet customers canceling their service. Now, it is launching a bold new offer to win them back. In Charter Communications’ fourth-quarter earnings ...

headline: Lambda Appoints Charles Fisher as Chief Financial Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 19, 2026--Lambda, the Superintelligence Cloud, today announced the appointment of Charles Fisher as Chief Financial Officer. Fisher will lead Lambda’s capital strategy and financial operations as the company enters its next phase of growth.
